divs: Sighting DetailsI received a call one night from my friend Billy and he was watching a star dance in the sky over Clovis CA. and wanted me to go in my back yard and witness what he was watching in the night sky . So i went into my back yard with two lady friends of mine and we witness by then a building floating over the city in Clovis , California . I told Billy i talk to him later and so i hung up the phone . I was in total awe to the size and the aray of lights going around this thing . It look like a building with deep red lights going around it in the clock wise posion . Well i watched it for about 5 minutes traveling south bound out of Clovis to Kings county . This has been the closes i've been to a UFO in all my life and me and the ladies still talk about it to this day . I think it is government myself , but i could be wrong . Well that is all i have right now to share . I've seen alot more UFO's too before that over Clovis area . The people i've been talking too have been seeing alot in the night skies and coming down to the mountains in the Clovis area . There are alot of strange things going on in the night skies in the central valley . I even witness a metalic cigar shape thing above Clovis back in Feb. 2008 . I was standing in the front yard with a friend and in the day light looing up and the south vally out of Clovis Calif. I seen jets coming up from the south , but this one did'nt have fins or wings on it and boy was it long . I told my friend about it and he said to me yeah it's a plan and then i told him look again and see it you can see any fins or wings on it . Well he looked again and he was in shock to see a cigar shape plane or what ever you want to call it and we talked just a couple of seconds and then it was traveling east bound without banking in the sky . It did a 90 degree trun without banking in the sky and we both were in awe then . Everytime we see each other now we talk about what we've seen in the day time skies over Clovis Calif. Thank you for your time and i hope this can help you our alittle bit . May Yahweh bless Mufon and all that it does ......... YHWH ......
